var des = new DES();
var message= "0100000100000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000";
var key = "0100000101000001010000010100000101000001010000010100000101000001";
var cipher = des.Crypt(message, key);

var genPlain = des.Decrypt(cipher, key);
genPlain == message ? "success" : "fail"




//var message = "0000000100100011010001010110011110001001101010111100110111101111";
//var key = "0001001100110100010101110111100110011011101111001101111111110001";
